test-case.name: Agent should be able to work with suggestion
test-case.title: Agent should be able to work with suggestion

step.name: Given AGENT_ASSISTANT tenant feature is set to true for General Bank Demo
step.title: Given AGENT_ASSISTANT tenant feature is set to true for General Bank Demo

step.name: And I login as agent of General Bank Demo
step.title: And I login as agent of General Bank Demo

step.name: Given User select General Bank Demo tenant
step.title: Given User select General Bank Demo tenant

step.name: And Click chat icon
step.title: And Click chat icon

step.name: When User enter Chat to Support into widget input field
step.title: When User enter Chat to Support into widget input field

step.name: Then Agent has new conversation request
step.title: Then Agent has new conversation request

step.name: And Agent click on new conversation request from touch
step.title: And Agent click on new conversation request from touch

step.name: When User enter trading hours into widget input field
step.title: When User enter trading hours into widget input field

step.name: Then There is correct suggestion shown on user message "trading hours"
step.title: Then There is correct suggestion shown on user message "trading hours"

step.name: And The suggestion for user message "trading hours" with the biggest confidence is added to the input field
step.title: And The suggestion for user message "trading hours" with the biggest confidence is added to the input field

step.name: When Agent click send button
step.title: When Agent click send button

step.name: Then User have to receive 'Selected branches in major shopping malls are open on Sundays (9am - 1pm or 10am - 2pm). You may visit to check the trading hours of your nearest branch. Use the cellphone banking app to do transactions 24/7. For more information on #TheBestWaytoBank you may visit us' text response for his 'trading hours' input
step.title: Then User have to receive 'Selected branches in major shopping malls are open on Sundays (9am - 1pm or 10am - 2pm). You may visit to check the trading hours of your nearest branch. Use the cellphone banking app to do transactions 24/7. For more information on #TheBestWaytoBank you may visit us' text response for his 'trading hours' input

step.name: When User enter interest rate into widget input field
step.title: When User enter interest rate into widget input field

step.name: When Agent add additional info " Thanks for asking" to suggested message
step.title: When Agent add additional info " Thanks for asking" to suggested message

step.name: And Agent click send button
step.title: And Agent click send button

step.name: Then User have to receive 'You'll earn the highest interest on a transaction account 5.35% interest per year on any amount up to R10 000 is calculated daily and credited to your account monthly. If your balance is more than R10 000, a rate of 5.35% to 5.75% per year will apply to the full balance, depending on how much is in your account. To earn higher interest rates, consider opening a savings plan. Rates may change from time to time, so check our rates and fees for the latest info.\n Thanks for asking' text response for his 'interest rate' input
step.title: Then User have to receive 'You'll earn the highest interest on a transaction account 5.35% interest per year on any amount up to R10 000 is calculated daily and credited to your account monthly. If your balance is more than R10 000, a rate of 5.35% to 5.75% per year will apply to the full balance, depending on how much is in your account. To earn higher interest rates, consider opening a savings plan. Rates may change from time to time, so check our rates and fees for the latest info.\n Thanks for asking' text response for his 'interest rate' input

step.name: When User enter i lost my card into widget input field
step.title: When User enter i lost my card into widget input field

step.name: Then There is correct suggestion shown on user message "i lost my card"
step.title: Then There is correct suggestion shown on user message "i lost my card"

step.name: And The suggestion for user message "i lost my card" with the biggest confidence is added to the input field
step.title: And The suggestion for user message "i lost my card" with the biggest confidence is added to the input field

step.name: And Agent is able to delete the suggestion from input field and sends his own "Let me see what I can do" message
step.title: And Agent is able to delete the suggestion from input field and sends his own "Let me see what I can do" message

step.name: Then User have to receive 'Let me see what I can do' text response for his 'i lost my card' input
step.title: Then User have to receive 'Let me see what I can do' text response for his 'i lost my card' input

label.name: story
label.value: Agent should be able to work with suggestion
